problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ∠ABC = N_0, BD bisects ∠ABC, ∠DAC = N_1, if AB = N_2, BC = N_3, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:在CB的延长线上取点E,使BE=AB,连接AE,∵∠ABC=120°,∴∠ABE=180-∠ABC=60°,∵BE=AB,∴△ABE为等边三角形,∴AE=AB,∠BAE=∠E=60°,∵∠DAC=60°,∴∠DAC=BAE,∵∠BAD=∠BAC+∠DAC,∠EAC=∠BAC+∠BAE,∴∠BAD=∠EAC,∵BD平分∠ABC,∴∠ABD=(media/image15.png)∠ABC=60°,∴∠ABD=∠E,在△ABD和△AEC中,(media/image16.png),∴△ABD≌△AEC(ASA),∴BD=CE,∵CE=BE+BC=AB+BC=3+2=5,∴BD=5,故选:A．(media/image17.png)
